# Summer (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You are considered a native of the waste for purposes of heat resistance (you have 1 level of protection). During the summer season, you gain a +2 bonus on all Wisdom-based skill checks.

**Summer Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Impede Sun's Brilliance (Spell)|Impede Sunâ€™s Brilliance]]****:** Diminishes the heat and light of the sun in an area.

**2** **[[Sunstroke (Spell)|Sunstroke]]****:** Target takes 2d6 nonlethal damage and is [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**3 [[Protection from Dessication (Spell)|Protection from Dessication]]:** Absorb 10 points/level of dessication damage.

**4** **[[Skin of the Cactus (Spell)|Skin of the Cactus]]****:** Grants natural armor, thorns, and resistance to dehydration.

**5** **[[Unearthly Heat (Spell)|Unearthly Heat]]****:** Target is subjected to unearthly heat for 1 round/level.

**6** **[[Sunbeam (Spell)|Sunbeam]]****:** Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Sunburst (Spell)|Sunburst]]****:** Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

**9** **[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]****:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 107
